Name: Rampage of the Dead
About the game: Rampage of the Dead is an arcade FPS endless wave shooter! Will you be able to survive the wrath of the enemies or they will take you over? Defend yourself and show them... show them all... Improve your chances of survival by buying guns and ammo, with a wide variety of more than 15 guns, buy structural defenses like electrical fences and turrets, but remember to keep in mind that everything has a cost, so don't run out of ammo! Key Features: First Person Shooter Endless gameplay Single player experience Immersive gameplay Point system Structure defense options Explosive barrels Different types of enemies Optional HUD Steam Achievements Types of guns: Pistols Shotguns Assault Rifles Snipers Machine guns Submachine guns Carbines Bull-pups
